DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to assess the bioequivalence of a potential generic 600 mg oxcarbazepine tablet formulation compared with Novartis Pharmaceutical's 600 mg oxcarbazepine tablet, Trileptal, following a single 600 mg dose administered under fasting conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalency Study of 600 mg Oxcarbazepine Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on the physical examination, medical history, or clinical labratory results duirng screening Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C. Treatment with known enzyme altering drugs. History of allergic or adverse response to oxcarbazepne or any other comparable or similar product.
